job_details.Vacaturetitel: Staff Software Engineer, Backend - ML Platform
job_details.Functieomschrijving: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Michelangelo ML Platform team (ML background is not required).
job_details.full_text:
Staff Software Engineer, Backend - ML Platform

We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Michelangelo ML Platform team (ML background is not required).

profile_classification.rationale: The job title includes 'ML Platform' and 'Staff Software Engineer, Backend', but the description explicitly states 'ML background is not required'. The core responsibilities and technologies are not detailed enough to firmly place it within ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. It leans towards a general backend software engineering role focused on supporting an ML platform, rather than developing ML models or GenAI applications directly. Therefore, 'Ambiguous' is the most appropriate classification due to the lack of specific technical AI/ML task details.
